meanings.sent1: The homeopaths in our town use natural remedies to help people.
meanings.sent2: Many homeopaths believe in the power of diluted substances to treat illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The homeopaths decided to have a potluck to celebrate their successful treatments.
meanings.sent4: The community sees the homeopaths as healers with a unique approach to medicine.
meanings.sent5: The group of homeopaths gathered under the oak tree to discuss new treatment methods.

meanings.sent1: Several homeopaths attended the conference to learn about the latest research.
meanings.sent2: The homeopaths' clinic offers a range of alternative treatments.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the homeopaths shared stories about their experiences with patients.
meanings.sent4: The field of homeopaths is growing as more people seek holistic healthcare.
meanings.sent5: The group of homeopaths traveled to different countries to study diverse healing practices.
